revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CZ.NIC |model=Turris Omnia |revision=(RTROM01-1G) |asin=B01MG47OY3;DE;,B01M7TNEP3, |price= |est_release_date=11/2016 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.33 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6820 |cpu1_cspeed=1.6 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=SK hynix |fla1_model=eMMC |ram1=1 GiB <!-- 2 GiB optionally --> |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TC4G63CFR-PBA |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, mSATA, SFP |expansion_minipcie_num=3 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |expansion_sfp_num=1 |jtag=yes,, populated,, 20-pin header |serial=yes,, populated,, 4-pin header,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_module=Compex WLE200N2 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (half) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9287 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Compex WLE900VX |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880 v2;QCA9880-BR4A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6176;88E6176-TFJ2; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=5 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=metal case, RTC, heatsink, SIM Card slot |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;;OpenWrt-deriv; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Turris |default_ssid_regex=^Turris$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |oui=04:F0:21 |oui_eth=D8:58:D7 }} {{TagLine|Open-source SOHO Network Router}}
[https://omnia.turris.cz/en/ Product page] (EN) {{•}} [https://www.turris.cz/doc/en/start Documentation] {{•}}[https://www.turris.cz/doc/_media/rtrom01-schema.pdf Schematics] :{{WPLink|Turris Omnia}}
Specifications, per their product page... *There are two variants of the Omnia - one with 1GiB and another with 2GiB RAM *3x MiniPCIe (1x MiniPCIe/mSATA)
Wireless modules used are per the below image, the one shown on Wikipedia.
==Additional external links== *[https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/turris-omnia-hi-performance-open-source-router-security-network '''Indiegogo''' campaign] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/10/15/turris-omnia-is-a-feature-packed-openwrt-router-board-powered-by-marvell-armada-385-processor/ ''Turris Omnia'' on '''SNX-Software'''] :ARMADA 385 SoC (88F6820) *[https://lede-project.org/toh/hwdata/turris/turris_turris_omnia '''LEDE Project''' HWDATA] :Power specifications are per LEDE's HWDATA *[https://forum.turris.cz/t/m-2-or-msata-drive-for-omnia/1026 ''M.2 or mSATA drive for Omnia'' on '''Turris''' forums] *[http://www.bortzmeyer.org/turris.html ''Turris''] [http://www.bortzmeyer.org/turris-bis.html ''Omnia'' on '''Bortzmeyer'''] ([http://www.bortzmeyer.org/images/turris-inside-with-msata.jpg internal image]) :RAM: ''SK hynix'' H5TC4G63CFR or ''Micron'' MT41K256M16HA
==Wikipedia images (from Lklundin, CC-BY-SA 4.0)== [[File:Turris Omnia router plugged in.jpg|600px|unit]] [[File:Turris_Omnia_router_without_cover_3.jpg|600px|board]]
==Wireless module compatibility== Some wireless modules, do not currently seem to play nice with the Omnia - they are simply not detected at all.
=== Tested as non-recognized (possibly non-working) === * [[Atheros AR5BXB6]] (AR5424 [abg]) ref. design ** [[Apple AR5BXB6]] ** [[Foxconn T60H921.05 (IBM)]] * [[Atheros AR5BHB63]] (AR2425 [bg]) ref. design ** unknown module, IBM FRU 43Y6511 * [[Atheros AR5B91]] (AR9281 [bgn, 1x2], half+full) ref. design ** [[Askey WLL6080]] * [[Atheros AR5BXB92]] (AR9280 [abgn, 2x2], full-size) ref. design ** [[Ubiquiti Networks SR71-E]] ** [[Foxconn U98Z044.00 (HP)]] * [[Intel PRO/Wireless 3945ABG]] * [[Intel Wireless WiFi Link 4965AGN]] === Tested as recognized (possibly working) === * [[Atheros AR5B95]] (AR9285 [bgn, 1x1]) ref. design ** [[Foxconn T77H047.31]] * [[Atheros AR5B97]] (AR9287 [bgn, 2x2]) ref. design ** [[Compex WLE200N2]], literally included with the unit * [[Atheros AR5B22]] (AR9462 [abgn, 2x2]) ref. design ** [[Foxconn T77H348.02]] * [[Atheros AR5BHB116]] (AR9382 [abgn, 2x2]) ref. design ** [[SparkLAN WPEA-121N]]/W * [[MikroTik R11e-2HnD]] (AR9582 [bgn, 2x2]) * [[MikroTik R11e-5HnD]] (AR9582 [an, 2x2]) * [[Compex WLE900VX]] (QCA9880v2 [abgn+ac, 3x3]), literally included with the unit * [[Intel WiFi Link 5100 (abgn, full size)]] * [[Intel WiFi Link 5300 (full size)]] * [[Intel Centrino Advanced-N 6200 (622ANHMW)]] * [[Intel Centrino Ultimate-N 6300]] * [[Lite-On WCBN607RH-H1 (HP)]] (RT3592, [abgn, 2x2])
__NOTOC__
